attributes.action: Local Discretionary Business Rates Retail Relief must include Medical services
attributes.additional_details: Currently giving a 12-month business rates holiday for only retail, hospitality and leisure businesses in England.  Medical Services are heavily affected by COVID-19. So they must add medical services to the  list of affected business.
attributes.background: The Chancellor has set out a package of temporary, timely and targeted measures to support public services, people and businesses through this period of disruption caused by COVID-19 which does not included Medical Services

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
